original_solution_mapping.L1: He spends $10/snake * 4 snakes = $<<10*4=40>>40 to feed his snakes every month
original_solution_mapping.L2: He spends $5/iguana * 2 iguanas = $<<5*2=10>>10 to feed his iguanas every month
original_solution_mapping.L3: He spends $15/gecko * 3 geckos = $<<15*3=45>>45 to feed his geckos every month
original_solution_mapping.L4: So overall he spends $40 + $10 + $45 = $<<40+10+45=95>>95 to feed all his pets every month
original_solution_mapping.L5: Therefore every year pet food costs him $95/month * 12 months = $<<95*12=1140>>1140

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1064.
    Returns: the total annual cost to feed all pets.
    """
    # L1
    cost_per_snake = 10 # $10 to feed each snake
    num_snakes = 4 # 4 snakes
    monthly_snake_cost = cost_per_snake * num_snakes

    # L2
    cost_per_iguana = 5 # $5 to feed each iguana
    num_iguanas = 2 # 2 iguanas
    monthly_iguana_cost = cost_per_iguana * num_iguanas

    # L3
    cost_per_gecko = 15 # $15 to feed each gecko
    num_geckos = 3 # 3 geckos
    monthly_gecko_cost = cost_per_gecko * num_geckos

    # L4
    total_monthly_cost = monthly_snake_cost + monthly_iguana_cost + monthly_gecko_cost

    # L5
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    total_annual_cost = total_monthly_cost * months_per_year

    # FA
    answer = total_annual_cost
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He spends ${cost_per_snake}/snake * {num_snakes} snakes = $<<{cost_per_snake}*{num_snakes}={monthly_snake_cost}>>{monthly_snake_cost} to feed his snakes every month
He spends ${cost_per_iguana}/iguana * {num_iguanas} iguanas = $<<{cost_per_iguana}*{num_iguanas}={monthly_iguana_cost}>>{monthly_iguana_cost} to feed his iguanas every month
He spends ${cost_per_gecko}/gecko * {num_geckos} geckos = $<<{cost_per_gecko}*{num_geckos}={monthly_gecko_cost}>>{monthly_gecko_cost} to feed his geckos every month

So overall he spends ${monthly_snake_cost} + ${monthly_iguana_cost} + ${monthly_gecko_cost} = $<<{monthly_snake_cost}+{monthly_iguana_cost}+{monthly_gecko_cost}={total_monthly_cost}>>{total_monthly_cost} to feed all his pets every month
Therefore every year pet food costs him ${total_monthly_cost}/month * {months_per_year} months = $<<{total_monthly_cost}*{months_per_year}={total_annual_cost}>>{total_annual_cost}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He spends $5/iguana * 2 iguanas = $<<5*2=10>>10 to feed his iguanas every month

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: So overall he spends $40 + $10 + $120 = $<<40+10+120=170>>170 to feed all his pets every month

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'monthly_snake_cost' (40) was used instead of 'cost_per_gecko' (15).
